projects.description: is a platform made to help individuals with dislexia and/or speach impediments. Using speech recognition technology it tracks you while you read and then trtaining you on sound which you find diffiult. V0.1 was made at the PCHacks Hackathon in 2019 (where it won first place) which support for web and Amazon Alexa; with V1.0 currently under developement for web, mobile, Google Home, and Amazon Alexa.
